short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows people to see and contribute to conversations on political topics in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pundit allows you to chat with others about politics in real time!  While you're browsing the internet, see what everyone else is saying about hot political topics, and contribute to the conversation!
